stories.title: Configure Exam Profile with Algorithm Type
stories.description: Allow administrators to create and configure exam profiles with specific adaptive algorithms
stories.iWant: to create an exam profile and select the algorithm type (Item Adaptive, Section Adaptive, Linear Fixed, or LOFT)
stories.soThat: I can deploy different exam methodologies without requiring code changes

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I am on the exam profile creation page, when I select an algorithm type from the dropdown, then the system saves the selection and displays algorithm-specific configuration options
Given I have selected Item_Adaptive algorithm, when I configure stopping rules, then I can set SEM threshold, min/max question counts, and time limits
Given I have configured an exam profile, when I save it, then the profile is available for assignment to test sessions

stories.title: Configure Scoring Model for Exam
stories.description: Enable selection and configuration of IRT or CTT scoring models per exam profile
stories.iWant: to select and configure a scoring model (Rasch, 1PL, 2PL, 3PL, or CTT) for each exam profile
stories.soThat: the exam uses the appropriate psychometric model for scoring and ability estimation

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I am configuring an exam profile, when I select an IRT model, then the system displays relevant parameter configuration options
Given I have selected a 3PL model, when the exam runs, then ability estimates use difficulty, discrimination, and guessing parameters
Given I select CTT scoring, when a test taker completes the exam, then the score is calculated as a simple sum or percentage

stories.title: Resume Interrupted Exam Session
stories.description: Allow test takers to resume an exam after disconnection with full state preservation
stories.iWant: to resume my exam from the exact point where I was disconnected
stories.soThat: network issues do not disadvantage me or cause me to lose progress

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I was disconnected during question 45 with 90 minutes remaining, when I reconnect and resume, then I see question 45 with exactly 90 minutes on the timer
Given I resume a session, when I continue the exam, then all my previous answers are preserved
Given the session state includes a theta estimate, when I resume, then the adaptive algorithm continues from my last estimated ability level

stories.title: Configure Navigation Mode
stories.description: Enable configuration of navigation constraints per exam profile
stories.iWant: to configure whether test takers can navigate back to previous questions
stories.soThat: I can enforce appropriate navigation rules based on the exam methodology

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I configure unidirectional navigation, when a test taker submits an answer, then the back button is disabled
Given I configure bidirectional navigation, when a test taker is on any question, then they can navigate to any previously answered question
Given bidirectional navigation is enabled, when a test taker flags a question, then they can access a review screen showing all flagged items

stories.title: Create Multi-Format Questions
stories.description: Support creation of questions with various interaction types
stories.iWant: to create questions with different interaction types (single select, multi-select, ordering, hotspot, drag-and-drop)
stories.soThat: I can assess different skills and knowledge types appropriately

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I am creating a question, when I select SATA type, then I can add multiple correct options and the system scores partial credit
Given I am creating an ordering question, when I define the correct sequence, then test takers can drag items into order
Given I create a hotspot question, when I upload an image and define clickable regions, then test takers can click on the image to answer

stories.title: Apply Hierarchical Tags to Questions
stories.description: Enable flexible tagging of questions with domain-specific taxonomies
stories.iWant: to tag questions with a hierarchical taxonomy (Domain > Subject > Topic > Competency)
stories.soThat: questions can be mapped to external syllabi and enable granular analytics

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I am tagging a question, when I select a domain, then I see filtered subjects within that domain
Given I have tagged questions, when I filter the question bank, then I can search by any level of the taxonomy
Given questions are tagged, when analytics are generated, then performance can be reported at any taxonomy level

stories.title: Manage Psychometric Parameters
stories.description: Store and manage IRT parameters for each question
stories.iWant: to view and edit the difficulty, discrimination, and guessing parameters for each question
stories.soThat: the adaptive algorithm can accurately select items and estimate ability

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I view a question, when I access psychometric data, then I see current values for β, α, and γ parameters
Given I update parameters after calibration, when I save changes, then the new values are used in subsequent item selection
Given questions have exposure counts, when I view the bank, then I can sort by exposure to identify overused items

stories.title: Generate Questions with AI
stories.description: Use LLM to generate draft questions based on exam profile and topic
stories.iWant: to generate draft questions using AI by specifying a topic and exam profile
stories.soThat: I can accelerate question bank development while maintaining quality standards

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I specify a topic and exam profile, when I request AI generation, then the system produces draft questions with stems, options, and rationales
Given AI generates questions, when I view them, then they include suggested taxonomy tags and difficulty estimates
Given AI-generated content, when saved, then all items have DRAFT status and cannot appear in live exams

stories.title: Review and Approve Draft Questions
stories.description: Workflow for validating and promoting questions to active status
stories.iWant: to review draft questions and approve them for live use
stories.soThat: only validated content appears in actual exams

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a question is in DRAFT status, when I review and approve it, then status changes to REVIEW
Given a question is in REVIEW status, when a second reviewer approves, then status changes to ACTIVE
Given a question is ACTIVE, when I retire it, then status changes to RETIRED and it no longer appears in item selection

stories.title: View Performance Gap Analysis
stories.description: Display comparison of current ability vs. passing standard
stories.iWant: to see how my current ability compares to the passing standard
stories.soThat: I understand my readiness and can focus my study efforts

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I complete a practice exam, when I view my dashboard, then I see my current theta vs. target theta visualized
Given gap analysis is displayed, when I drill down, then I see performance gaps by topic and competency
Given I have multiple practice sessions, when I view trends, then I see how my gap has changed over time

stories.title: View Predicted Ready Date
stories.description: Calculate and display estimated exam readiness date
stories.iWant: to see when I am predicted to be ready based on my improvement rate
stories.soThat: I can plan my exam date and study schedule effectively

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I have completed multiple practice sessions, when I view predictions, then I see an estimated ready date
Given my improvement rate changes, when I view the dashboard, then the predicted date updates accordingly
Given I have insufficient data, when I view predictions, then the system displays a message indicating more practice is needed

stories.title: Receive Personalized Study Recommendations
stories.description: Generate targeted study tasks based on weak areas
stories.iWant: to receive personalized study recommendations targeting my weakest areas
stories.soThat: I can improve efficiently by focusing on topics where I need the most help

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given my performance data shows weakness in Topic X, when I view recommendations, then I see a suggested quiz on Topic X
Given I complete a recommended task, when I return to dashboard, then new recommendations reflect my updated performance
Given multiple weak areas exist, when I view recommendations, then they are prioritized by severity of gap

stories.title: Add New Exam Type via Strategy
stories.description: Enable adding new exam methodologies without core code changes
stories.iWant: to add support for a new exam type by implementing a strategy class
stories.soThat: the platform can be extended without modifying or risking the core engine

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I create a new strategy class implementing the scoring interface, when I register it, then it appears as an algorithm option
Given I deploy a new strategy, when existing exams run, then they are unaffected by the new code
Given a strategy is registered, when I create an exam profile, then I can select the new algorithm type

stories.title: Integrate Services via API
stories.description: Enable communication between services through defined APIs
stories.iWant: to integrate with the Scoring Service and Content Service via versioned REST APIs
stories.soThat: I can build custom frontends or integrate with external systems

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I call the Scoring Service API, when I submit an answer, then I receive the updated theta and next item selection
Given I call the Content Service API, when I request an item, then I receive the full item content and metadata
Given APIs are versioned, when a new version is released, then the previous version continues to work for backward compatibility

stories.title: Experience Fast Item Transitions
stories.description: Ensure responsive item delivery for optimal test experience
stories.iWant: to see the next question appear within 200ms of submitting my answer
stories.soThat: my exam experience is smooth and I am not disadvantaged by system delays

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I submit an answer in an adaptive exam, when the next item loads, then it appears in less than 200ms (P95)
Given high system load, when I take an exam, then latency remains under 200ms
Given latency is measured, when reports are generated, then P95 latency metrics are available for monitoring

stories.title: Scale for Peak Demand
stories.description: Handle concurrent user spikes without degradation
stories.iWant: the system to handle 10,000 concurrent test sessions without performance degradation
stories.soThat: we can conduct large-scale testing events without issues

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given 10,000 concurrent sessions, when all users submit answers, then response times remain under SLA
Given traffic spikes, when auto-scaling triggers, then new instances come online within 2 minutes
Given the system is under load, when I view metrics, then I can monitor container health and scaling status

stories.title: Control Item Exposure
stories.description: Prevent overuse of individual questions
stories.iWant: the system to limit how frequently any single item is shown
stories.soThat: item bank security is maintained and no questions become compromised

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given exposure control is configured, when items are selected, then high-exposure items are less likely to be chosen
Given an item reaches its exposure threshold, when selection runs, then it is excluded until exposure resets
Given I view exposure reports, when I analyze the data, then I can see exposure distribution across the item bank

stories.title: Prevent Question Harvesting
stories.description: Detect and block attempts to scrape the question bank
stories.iWant: the system to detect and block users attempting to harvest questions
stories.soThat: the integrity of the question bank is protected

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a user rapidly cycles through exams, when anomaly detection triggers, then their account is flagged
Given rate limiting is configured, when a user exceeds exam attempt limits, then further attempts are blocked
Given suspicious activity is detected, when I view security alerts, then I see details and can take action

stories.title: Access Comprehensive Audit Logs
stories.description: Log all test session activity for forensic analysis
stories.iWant: to access detailed audit logs of every test session
stories.soThat: I can investigate score validity and potential fraud

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a test session completes, when I access audit logs, then I see every keystroke and timing data
Given answer changes are allowed, when a test taker changes an answer, then both original and final answers are logged
Given audit logs exist, when I attempt to modify them, then the system prevents changes (immutable logs)

stories.title: Ensure Data Durability
stories.description: Guarantee no data loss for exam results
stories.iWant: exam results to be stored with ACID guarantees
stories.soThat: no results are lost due to system failures or network issues

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a test taker submits their final answer, when the transaction commits, then the result is durably stored
Given a network failure during result submission, when connection restores, then the transaction either completes or rolls back cleanly
Given database replication is configured, when the primary fails, then the standby takes over with no data loss
